clinical_study.brief_title: X-Linked Hypohidrotic Ectodermal Dysplasia (XLHED) Carrier Outlook Toward Reproduction Survey
clinical_study.official_title: Survey of X-Linked Hypohidrotic Ectodermal Dysplasia Carrier Women's Outlook Towards Reproduction, Potential XLHED Treatments and Genetic Testing

brief_summary.textblock: In this survey of X-Lined Hypohidrotic Ectodermal Dysplasia (XLHED) carrier females, Edimer proposes to review responses to an XLHED Carrier Outlook toward Reproduction Survey in order to understand attitudes toward reproduction, potential treatments and genetic testing in order to improve the understanding of the decisions that XLHED carrier females make regarding their reproductive future.

detailed_description.textblock:
The full survey is available here: https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/X-CORS
For more questions or more details you may contact the Principal Investigator, Carrie Milliard: MILLIC@mmc.org or 207-662-6712

primary_outcome.measure: To study the outlook of XLHED carrier females toward reproduction, potential XLHED treatments and genetic testing.
primary_outcome.description: Survey results will be collected during the 1 day of subject involvement.

study_pop.textblock: The study will enroll XLHED carrier females
